participant_1.background:

i used to be a meat eater but i m now a vegan.
I wake up early, spend time with my family, and work hard to provide for them.
My parents are not supportive of my singing because they want me to have a stable career.

content.text: Happy birthday! What did you have for your breakfast?
Thanks! I had pancakes with extra syrup and bacon!
Sounds delicious! I love breakfast foods.
Me too! I'm glad you're a vegan. I'm not, but I'm trying to eat less meat.
That's great! I used to be a meat eater, but I switched to a vegan diet about a year ago.
What made you make the switch?
I was concerned about the environmental impact of meat production, and I also didn't like the way animals are treated in factory farms.
I can understand that. I'm trying to be more conscious of the environment, but it's hard to give up meat.
It was hard for me too, but it's been worth it. I feel better about myself and the planet.
I'm glad it's worked out for you. Maybe I'll give it a try sometime.
I hope you do! It's not as hard as you might think.
